Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies.demandFlexStrategies

Class DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduling.schedulingStrategies.demandFlexStrategies.DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DemandFlexibilityStrategy

    public class DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DemandFlexibilityStrategy
    This class implements a scheduling strategy that can be used by the scheduler component of the DC to schedule the power adjustment that is required during a DR event.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected DVFSStrategy dvfsStrategy
      Strategy that is used to determine the jobs for which the execution frequency is scaled.
      private LPOptimizer lpSolver
      Solver to optimize the schedule within a DR event.
      protected double maximumFrequency
      Maximum possible frequency (GHz) to which the CPUs can be scaled.
      protected double minimumFrequency
      Minimum possible frequency (GHz) to which the CPUs can be scaled.
      private int previouslyShiftedNodeSteps
      Indicates how much node steps were shifted through the previously tested configuration of shifting fraction and scaling frequency.
      private double scalingFrequency
      Frequency to which the execution frequency is scaled for the scaled jobs.
      private double shiftingPowerFraction
      Fraction of the shiftable amount of node steps that will be shifted.
      protected ShiftingStrategy shiftingStrategy
      Strategy that is used to determine the jobs that are shifted.

    • Method Detail

      • adjustPowerConsumption

        public SchedulingResult adjustPowerConsumption​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                               java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                                               java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                               java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                               java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                                               double consumptionBoundCalcBase,
                                               double powerConsumptionBound,
                                               int schedulingInterval,
                                               int currentTime,
                                               ReserveProvisionType provisionType,
                                               DC handledDC)
        Description copied from interface: DemandFlexibilityStrategy
        This method can be used to adjust the current schedule of the DC so that the power consumption profile of the DC is adjusted to a specified power consumption bound.
        Specified by:
        adjustPowerConsumption in interface DemandFlexibilityStrategy
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all currently submitted jobs.
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all currently submitted jobs that were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        consumptionBoundCalcBase - Total facility power consumption that was the basis of the calculation of the power consumption bound.
        powerConsumptionBound - Power consumption bound.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted starts.
        provisionType - Type of the requested power reserve provision.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that calls this strategy belongs.
        Returns:

      • getNodeAmountToPostpone

        private int getNodeAmountToPostpone​(java.util.List<BatchJob> postponableJobs,
                                    int intervalStart,
                                    int intervalEnd)
        Calculates the postponable amount of node steps in the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted.
        Parameters:
        postponableJobs - List of all jobs that can be postponed.
        intervalStart - Start of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted in simulation time.
        intervalEnd - End of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted in simulation time.
        Returns:
        The amount of node steps in the specified interval that are postponable.

      • getNodeAmountToPrepone

        private int getNodeAmountToPrepone​(java.util.List<BatchJob> preponableJobs,
                                   int intervalStart,
                                   int intervalEnd)
        Calculates the preponable amount of node steps in the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted.
        Parameters:
        preponableJobs - List of all jobs that can be postponed.
        intervalStart - Start of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted in simulation time.
        intervalEnd - End of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted in simulation time.
        Returns:
        The amount of node steps in the specified interval that are preponable.
